title: Watch: 1000-Kg Angry Rhino Chases Two Bikers, As Shocked People Watch From Their Balconies
text:
It is not a good idea to agitate any animal of the wild, be it a lion or a skunk. And if one irritates big animals like elephants and rhinoceros that can weigh up to 1000 kg, thinking that they would not be able to chase humans, then this is one of the biggest follies you can commit.

A video has surfaced on Twitter and is going viral as we speak. In the video, one can see a rhino chasing after two men on bike. The exact location and original time and year of the video is not known, however the comments on the video hint that it could be Assam.

Rhino striding the streets. It’s not the 55km/ hr speed that matters, they reach the full speed from zero in a matter of seconds in few strides.Thats incredible fast for a mammal weighing more than 1000 kgs. pic.twitter.com/MZ86seZ4BZ — Susanta Nanda IFS (@susantananda3) October 5, 2019

IFS Sushant Nanda shared the video, and according to the caption rhinos can go from zero to full speed in a matter of seconds in few strides. That's incredibly fast for a mammal weighing more than 1000 kg.

Don’t know what the two bikers did to piss off the rhino, but the latter seems pretty determined to chase them down. The eight-second clip is pretty terrifying because one does not expect a heavy animal like that to run that fast.
